verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

שְׁלַח־ <S%H7971><s%> she-lach- Send לְךָ֣ le-Cha אֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H582><s%> 'a-na-Shim, thou men וְיָתֻ֙רוּ֙ <S%H8446><s%> ve-ya-Tu-ru that they may search אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an, of Canaan אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am נֹתֵ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten which I give לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish of every אֶחָד֩ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad a man אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish A man אֶחָ֜ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad a לְמַטֵּ֤ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh tribe אֲבֹתָיו֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tav of their fathers תִּשְׁלָ֔חוּ <S%H7971><s%> tish-La-chu, shall ye send כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol every נָשִׂ֥יא <S%H5387><s%> na-Si every one a ruler בָהֶֽם׃ va-Hem.

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent אֹתָ֥ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses מִמִּדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> mi-mid-Bar them from the wilderness פָּארָ֖ן <S%H6290><s%> pa-Ran of Paran עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- at פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> pi by the commandment יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD כֻּלָּ֣ם <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam all אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shim, men רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei heads בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah. [were]

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh These שְׁמוֹתָ֑ם <S%H8034><s%> she-mo-Tam; And these [were] their names לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh of the tribe רְאוּבֵ֔ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven, of Reuben שַׁמּ֖וּעַ <S%H8051><s%> sham-Mu-a' Shammua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son זַכּֽוּר׃ <S%H2139><s%> zak-Kur. of Zaccur

לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe שִׁמְע֔וֹן <S%H8095><s%> shim-'on, of Simeon שָׁפָ֖ט <S%H8202><s%> sha-Fat Shaphat בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son חוֹרִֽי׃ <S%H2753><s%> cho-Ri. of Hori

לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah כָּלֵ֖ב <S%H3612><s%> ka-Lev Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְפֻנֶּֽה׃ <S%H3312><s%> ye-fun-Neh. of Jephunneh

לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe יִשָּׂשכָ֔ר <S%H3485><s%> yis-so-sh-Char, of Issachar יִגְאָ֖ל <S%H3008><s%> yig-'Al Igal בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef. of Joseph
לְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe אֶפְרָ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim of Ephraim הוֹשֵׁ֥עַ <S%H1954><s%> ho-She-a' Oshea בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> bin- the son נֽוּן׃ <S%H5126><s%> Nun. of Nun

לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe בִנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> vin-ya-Min, of Benjamin פַּלְטִ֖י <S%H6406><s%> pal-Ti Palti בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son רָפֽוּא׃ <S%H7505><s%> ra-Fu. of Raphu

לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe זְבוּלֻ֔ן <S%H2074><s%> ze-vu-Lun, of Zebulun גַּדִּיאֵ֖ל <S%H1427><s%> gad-di-'El Gaddiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son סוֹדִֽי׃ <S%H5476><s%> so-Di. of Sodi

לְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef of Joseph לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh [namely] of the tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh; of Manasseh גַּדִּ֖י <S%H1426><s%> gad-Di Gaddi בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son סוּסִֽי׃ <S%H5485><s%> su-Si. of Susi

לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe דָ֔ן <S%H1835><s%> Dan, of Dan עַמִּיאֵ֖ל <S%H5988><s%> 'am-mi-'El Ammiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son גְּמַלִּֽי׃ <S%H1582><s%> ge-mal-Li. of Gemalli

לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe אָשֵׁ֔ר <S%H836><s%> 'a-Sher, of Asher סְת֖וּר <S%H5639><s%> se-Tur Sethur בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מִיכָאֵֽל׃ <S%H4317><s%> mi-cha-'El. of Michael

לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe נַפְתָּלִ֔י <S%H5321><s%> naf-ta-Li, of Naphtali נַחְבִּ֖י <S%H5147><s%> nach-Bi Nahbi בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son וָפְסִֽי׃ <S%H2058><s%> va-fe-Si. of Vophsi
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe גָ֔ד <S%H1410><s%> Gad, of Gad גְּאוּאֵ֖ל <S%H1345><s%> ge-'u-'El Geuel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מָכִֽי׃ <S%H4352><s%> ma-Chi. of Machi

אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These שְׁמ֣וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot These [are] the names הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim, of the men אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach sent מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh which Moses לָת֣וּר <S%H8446><s%> la-Tur to spy out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; the land וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses לְהוֹשֵׁ֥עַ <S%H1954><s%> le-ho-She-a' Oshea בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> bin- the son נ֖וּן <S%H5126><s%> nun of Nun יְהוֹשֻֽׁעַ׃ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a'. Jehoshua

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, And Moses לָת֖וּר <S%H8446><s%> la-Tur them to spy out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, to עֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lu unto them Get you up זֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> zeh there בַּנֶּ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> ban-Ne-gev, this [way] southward וַעֲלִיתֶ֖ם <S%H5927><s%> va-'a-li-Tem and go up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har. into the mountain

וּרְאִיתֶ֥ם <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'i-Tem And see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the land מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am what it [is] and the people הַיֹּשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-Shev that dwelleth עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha, and הֶחָזָ֥ק <S%H2389><s%> he-cha-Zak therein whether they [be] strong הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hu he הֲרָפֶ֔ה <S%H7504><s%> ha-ra-Peh, or weak הַמְעַ֥ט <S%H4592><s%> ham-'At few ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- or רָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> Rav. or many

וּמָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> u-Mah How הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, And what the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hu they יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev [is] that they dwell in בָּ֔הּ Bah, הֲטוֹבָ֥ה <S%H2896><s%> ha-to-Vah whether it [be] good הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- or רָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah; or bad וּמָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> u-Mah How הֶֽעָרִ֗ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim, and what cities אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hu they יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev [they be] that they dwell בָּהֵ֔נָּה <S%H2007><s%> ba-Hen-nah, in הַבְּמַֽחֲנִ֖ים <S%H4264><s%> hab-be-ma-cha-Nim whether in tents אִ֥ם <S%H518><s%> 'im or בְּמִבְצָרִֽים׃ <S%H4013><s%> be-miv-tza-Rim. or in strong holds

וּמָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> u-Mah How הָ֠אָרֶץ <S%H776><s%> Ha-'a-retz And what the land הַשְּׁמֵנָ֨ה <S%H8082><s%> hash-she-me-Nah [is] whether it [be] fat הִ֜וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- or רָזָ֗ה <S%H7330><s%> ra-Zah, or lean הֲיֵֽשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> ha-yesh- whether there be בָּ֥הּ bah עֵץ֙ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz wood אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- or אַ֔יִן <S%H369><s%> 'A-yin, not וְהִ֨תְחַזַּקְתֶּ֔ם <S%H2388><s%> ve-Hit-chaz-zak-Tem, therein or not And be ye of good courage וּלְקַחְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3947><s%> u-le-kach-Tem and bring מִפְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> mip-pe-Ri of the fruit הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; of the land וְהַ֨יָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> ve-Hai-ya-Mim, Now the time יְמֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei [was] the time בִּכּוּרֵ֥י <S%H1061><s%> bik-ku-Rei of the firstripe עֲנָבִֽים׃ <S%H6025><s%> 'a-na-Vim. grapes

וַֽיַּעֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lu So they went up וַיָּתֻ֣רוּ <S%H8446><s%> vai-ya-Tu-ru and searched אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; the land מִמִּדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> mi-mid-bar- from the wilderness צִ֥ן <S%H6790><s%> tzin of Zin עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far רְחֹ֖ב <S%H7340><s%> re-Cho unto Rehob לְבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> le-Vo as men come חֲמָֽת׃ <S%H2574><s%> cha-Mat. to Hamath

וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lu And they ascended בַנֶּגֶב֮ <S%H5045><s%> van-ne-Gev by the south וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo and came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against חֶבְרוֹן֒ <S%H2275><s%> chev-rOn unto Hebron וְשָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> ve-Sham where אֲחִימַן֙ <S%H289><s%> 'a-chi-Man where Ahiman שֵׁשַׁ֣י <S%H8344><s%> she-Shai Sheshai וְתַלְמַ֔י <S%H8526><s%> ve-tal-Mai, and Talmai יְלִידֵ֖י <S%H3211><s%> ye-li-Dei the children הָעֲנָ֑ק <S%H6061><s%> ha-'a-Nak; of Anak וְחֶבְר֗וֹן <S%H2275><s%> ve-chev-Ron, [were] (Now Hebron שֶׁ֤בַע <S%H7651><s%> She-va' seven שָׁנִים֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim years נִבְנְתָ֔ה <S%H1129><s%> niv-ne-Tah, was built לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before צֹ֥עַן <S%H6814><s%> Tzo-'an Zoan מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. Egypt

וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u And they came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> Na-chal unto the brook אֶשְׁכֹּ֗ל <S%H812><s%> 'esh-Kol, of Eshcol וַיִּכְרְת֨וּ <S%H3772><s%> vai-yich-re-Tu and cut down מִשָּׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham there זְמוֹרָה֙ <S%H2156><s%> ze-mo-Rah from thence a branch וְאֶשְׁכּ֤וֹל <S%H811><s%> ve-'esh-Kol cluster עֲנָבִים֙ <S%H6025><s%> 'a-na-Vim of grapes אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, with one וַיִּשָּׂאֻ֥הוּ <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-sa-'U-hu and they bare בַמּ֖וֹט <S%H4132><s%> vam-Mot upon a staff בִּשְׁנָ֑יִם <S%H8147><s%> bish-Na-yim; it between two וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- some הָרִמֹּנִ֖ים <S%H7416><s%> ha-rim-mo-Nim and [they brought] of the pomegranates וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- some הַתְּאֵנִֽים׃ <S%H8384><s%> hat-te-'e-Nim. and of the figs

לַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> lam-ma-Kom The place הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he קָרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra was called נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> Na-chal the brook אֶשְׁכּ֑וֹל <S%H812><s%> esh-Kol; Eshcol עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al because אֹד֣וֹת <S%H182><s%> o-Dot because of הָֽאֶשְׁכּ֔וֹל <S%H811><s%> ha-'esh-Kol, the cluster of grapes אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which כָּרְת֥וּ <S%H3772><s%> ka-re-Tu cut down מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham there בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei which the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <S%H7725><s%> vai-ya-Shu-vu And they returned מִתּ֣וּר <S%H8446><s%> mit-Tur from searching הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; of the land מִקֵּ֖ץ <S%H7093><s%> mik-Ketz after אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im forty יֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> Yom. days
